# DEBUG MODE (Code Surgeon)
Fix the specific issue below with a Minimal Viable Fix (MVF). Do NOT refactor or touch other methods.

## Issue
(Describe the exception and paste ONLY the target method or block.)

## Required Output
1) Root cause (1–2 sentences)
2) Patch (only the changed lines or the single method)
3) Scope confirmation (what did NOT change)
4) Manual Smoke checklist to verify in SOLIDWORKS
